member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicNodePayload
member.summary: Payload class for TreeNode<TopicNodePayload> to bind in MAUI CollectionView. Represents domain TopicNode data without coupling to CriticalInsight.Data in Domain layer.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeAdapter
member.summary: Adapter that builds TreeNode<TopicNodePayload> tree from domain TopicNode aggregate. Maintains mapping between DomainNodeId and ITreeNode for bidirectional updates.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeAdapter.BuildTree(IdeaBranch.Domain.TopicNode)
member.summary: Builds a TreeNode tree from a domain topic tree structure.
member.param: The root domain TopicNode

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeAdapter.BuildTreeNode(IdeaBranch.Domain.TopicNode,CriticalInsight.Data.Hierarchical.TreeNode{IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicNodePayload})
member.summary: Recursively builds a TreeNode from a domain TopicNode.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeAdapter.GetTreeNode(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets the TreeNode associated with a domain node ID.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeAdapter.GetDomainNodeId(CriticalInsight.Data.Hierarchical.ITreeNode)
member.summary: Gets the domain node ID associated with a TreeNode.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider
member.summary: Provider that creates and manages a TreeView over a TreeNode<TopicNodePayload> tree. Exposes ProjectedCollection for binding to MAUI CollectionView with Depth-based indentation.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider.InitializeTreeView(IdeaBranch.Domain.TopicNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a TreeView from a domain topic tree.
member.param: The root domain TopicNode
Whether nodes should be expanded by default

member.name: P:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider.ProjectedCollection
member.summary: Gets the TreeView's ProjectedCollection for binding to CollectionView.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider.SetIsExpanded(CriticalInsight.Data.Hierarchical.ITreeNode,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets or sets the expanded state of a node.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider.GetIsExpanded(CriticalInsight.Data.Hierarchical.ITreeNode)
member.summary: Gets the expanded state of a node.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider.IsNodeVisible(CriticalInsight.Data.Hierarchical.ITreeNode)
member.summary: Checks if a node is visible in the current projection.

member.name: P:IdeaBranch.App.Adapters.TopicTreeViewProvider.RootNode
member.summary: Gets the root TreeNode.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.CountToBoolConverter
member.summary: Converts count (int) to bool: true if count > 0, false otherwise.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.DepthToThicknessConverter
member.summary: Converts Depth (int) to Thickness for left margin indentation in CollectionView items. ConverterParameter specifies the indent amount per level (default: 16).

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.InvertedBoolConverter
member.summary: Converts bool to inverted bool: true becomes false, false becomes true. Useful for disabling buttons when IsBusy is true.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.InvertedBoolToFontAttributesConverter
member.summary: Converts bool to FontAttributes: false becomes Bold, true becomes None. Used to show unread notifications in bold.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.NodePayloadDomainIdConverter
member.summary: Extracts DomainNodeId from TopicNodePayload stored in ITreeNode.PayloadObject.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.NodePayloadPromptConverter
member.summary: Extracts Prompt from TopicNodePayload stored in ITreeNode.PayloadObject.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.NodePayloadTitleConverter
member.summary: Extracts Title from TopicNodePayload stored in ITreeNode.PayloadObject.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Converters.StringEqualityToBoolConverter
member.summary: Converts string equality to bool: returns true if the value equals the parameter (case-insensitive). Useful for conditional visibility based on selected category or option.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Platforms.Android.AndroidNotificationService
member.summary: Android-specific notification service implementation.

member.summary: Creates the notification channel for Android 8.0+.

member.summary: Requests notification permission for Android 13+.

member.summary: Gets the notification permission status for Android 13+.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Services.ExampleApiService
member.summary: Example API service demonstrating resilience policies with real HTTP calls. Uses httpbin.org for testing retry and circuit breaker behavior.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Services.ExampleApiService.GetTestDataAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets a test resource with automatic retry on transient errors. Demonstrates idempotent operation (GET) with full resilience policy.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Services.ExampleApiService.PostTestDataAsync(System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Simulates a POST operation with limited retry (non-idempotent). Demonstrates that POST requests only retry on connection/timeout errors.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Services.ExampleApiService.TestRetryBehaviorAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tests retry behavior with a status code endpoint. httpbin.org/status/{code} returns the specified status code.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Services.ExampleApiService.TestCircuitBreakerAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tests circuit breaker behavior by triggering multiple failures. Use /status/500 to trigger circuit breaker.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Services.ExampleApiService.TestDelayAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tests delay endpoint to see exponential backoff in action. httpbin.org/delay/{seconds} waits before responding.

member.name: T:IdeaBranch.App.Services.TestResponse
member.summary: Test response model for httpbin.org endpoints.

member.summary: Builds chat messages from prompt and context path.

member.summary: Interface for LLM client implementations. Supports both local (LM Studio) and cloud (Azure OpenAI) providers.

member.summary: Generates a response for the given prompt, using context from parent nodes.
member.param: The user's prompt/question.
Context from parent nodes (root to parent), used to build conversation context.
Token to cancel the operation.

member.name: M:IdeaBranch.App.Services.LLM.ILLMClient.SuggestTitleAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Suggests a title for the given prompt and response pair.
member.param: The user's prompt/question.
The generated response.
Token to cancel the operation.
member.returns: A suggested title, or null if generation fails.

member.summary: Moves a node to a new parent.
